text: Bryan Lee (March 16, 1943 â€“ August 21, 2020) was an American blues guitarist and singer. He was also known by the nickname 'Braille Blues Daddy'. He was a known singer on Bourbon Street since the 1980s. He died on August 21, 2020, at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American blues singers Category:American blues musicians Category:American guitarists Category:Musicians from Wisconsin Category:Singers from Wisconsin
